# z-toast-notification-list

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                                                                                                             | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | Default                                    |
| ------------- | ------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| `newestontop` | `newestontop` | Set the entry position of new notification in the list                                                                  | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | `true`                                     |
| `position`    | `position`    | Set the position of toast notification list - top-left, top-centre, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-centre, bottom-right | `ToastNotificationPositionsEnum.BOTTOM_CENTRE \| ToastNotificationPositionsEnum.BOTTOM_LEFT \| ToastNotificationPositionsEnum.BOTTOM_RIGHT \| ToastNotificationPositionsEnum.TOP_CENTRE \| ToastNotificationPositionsEnum.TOP_LEFT \| ToastNotificationPositionsEnum.TOP_RIGHT` | `ToastNotificationPositionsEnum.TOP_RIGHT` |
